*** Sat, 3 Sep 2016 22:34:58 ***
TEST FOR GRANGER-CAUSALITY:
H0: "realcons, realgdp" do not Granger-cause "realinv"

Test statistic l = 15.6399
pval-F( l; 8, 546) = 0.0000 

TEST FOR INSTANTANEOUS CAUSALITY:
H0: No instantaneous causality between "realcons, realgdp" and "realinv"

Test statistic: c = 79.9025
pval-Chi( c; 2) = 0.0000
